metadata.title: Moment.js: Path traversal  in moment.locale (moderate)
metadata.description:
DOCUMENTATION: A path traversal vulnerability was found in Moment.js that impacts npm (server) users. This issue occurs if a user-provided locale string is directly used to switch moment locale, which an attacker can exploit to change the correct path to one of their choice. This can result in a loss of integrity. 
            
            MITIGATION: Sanitize the user-provided locale name before passing it to Moment.js.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 is installed
grafana is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
